title: 230 constant ping !!!!!!
body:
i have been playing since season 3 well within the last month and a half i have been having a constant ping issue. i am used to playing at 67 ping and it never changes and that is just perfect for me. but lately from 7 am to about 10-1030 pm i have a constant 230 ping. i have troubleshot everything to no end and cant figure anything out and im at a loss for ideas. i have been in a constant battle with our current isp for a month now they have replaced everything in and outside the house from the modem to the drop line and everything so i know all that is brand new and im still having the issue. i have replaced our internet router with a brand new one and all the ethernet cables that we use so its not that. im playing on the pc i built so i know its not a crappy computer issue either im starting to just feel like maybe the NA servers are having issues but i dont know? is there anyone that can give me any insight into this because i am so frusterated with it league is the only game i enjoy playing and i have spent hundreds of dollars if not thousands on this game and i feel like i can no longer play it but nothing else is fun to me anymore it sucks i work all day 6 days a week and come home to not even be able to relax and play league or anything. any help would be great! thank you for reading my rant
sincerely Sexualpanda

replies.body:
Typically when I see an issue like this, where latency is increased during specific hours of the day, it's a result of ISP rerouting to mitigate network congestion. You already tried some great steps to troubleshoot this, so we'll likely want to grab a traceroute for both the time when you see the issue and another when you don't have the issue.

You can run a traceroute using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/) and plug in the IP Address 104.160.131.1 then run a trace for 5 minutes. After that time has passed, export your results as a text, then paste them in a reply to me.

Let me know if you have any questions about this.
